name: Blood of a Demon
description:
BLOOD OF A DEMON is a horror escape room game where you get entangled in a supernatural plot of revenge causing you to mysteriously wake up in an escape room. But beware, if you think you are alone in here, think again because you are not. A demon lies in the rooms waiting for your presence and will not let you out easily. This game contains 5 rooms for you to try and escape. But even when freed, your job is not over yet.

SEE NO EVIL
The demon is invisible, however, you have a radar to help you, use it wisely.

HEAR NO EVIL
The demon is completely silent, you can not hear it so be careful.

SPEAK NO EVIL
The plushie wants to help you but it can not speak, it can only whistle.
